# map(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a new column by applying a transformation to every element.

## Declaration

```swift
func map<T>(_ transform: (ColumnSlice<WrappedElement>.Element) throws -> T?) rethrows -> Column<T>
```

## Parameters

- **transform**: The transformation closure.
title: map(_:)
